article_title: The Morning Download: Beyond the Password, New Algorithms Analyze Behavior to Assess Who’s Who
article_text:
Kacper Pempel/Reuters

Companies, frustrated with the limitations of the password as a mechanism for identifying employees and other legitimate users of their networks, are developing a new generation of algorithms that can identify people by analyzing their behavior. Google, Wells Fargo and Aetna are among the companies making strides in this area
